description:
These easily adjustable, fully rigid crampons feature a removable, forged, and asymmetrical front point. The Rambo is well-suited to steep ice and mixed climbing. The length can be easily adjusted with the removal of a single bolt. An "accordion-style" section between the front and rear section of the antibott plate also accommodates small changes in crampon length.

  • Made of chromoly steel to keep these durable and long lasting
  • Replaceable front point can changed quickly with a single screw, for those mixed terrain missions
  • Shorter secondary front point amps upside support, to get to those awkward foot holds
  • Rigid plastic antibott (included) with soft active sections to facilitate snow removal
  • Updated buckle and heel spur make this an easy on and off for quick transitions
name: Grivel Rambo 4 EVO Crampons
